basics.name: Jason Wright
basics.label: Linux Admin & Software Engineer
basics.summary: 6 Years experience with infallible motivation and crunch-time resolve.

work.summary: Makes all of the tech decisions.
highlights: Maintained vision on the Development team
Encouraged professional and personal growth
Created various internal projects to cultivate team inspiration and alleviate internal stresses
Managed sprints
All previous Invexi responsibilities (see below)

work.summary: Manages database and framework architecture and server deployment.
highlights: Advised upper management on Agile development practices
Maintained daily standups, SCRUM practices, and oversaw Jira and Slack integration
Wrote various slack integrations using PHP and Python
Planned, designed, and executed feature improvements within custom WIGUM framework
Tutored coworkers on best practices surrounding code performance and developmental efficiency
Implemented and enforced agreeable coding standards
Wrote and implemented a one-click code and database update module
Managed countless production deploys
Configured CentOS and Ubuntu servers for staging and production environments
Cut server migration time down from weeks to days
Set up Nagios monitoring, wrote custom integrations with PHP and Python
Bash automation and provisioning
Vagrant / VirtualBox development and provisioning scripts
Recovered client data from backup software images by mounting through Vagrant/VBox
Configured office network with a Ubiquiti switch

work.summary: Full platform and software development and innovation.
highlights: Promoted to senior level within a year
Custom server & data center builds
Handled Linux updates without downtime
Ubuntu Server setup and performance tuning
Configured raid0, raid1, and raid10 using custom stride and chunk for optimal performance
Monitored system performance using top, iostat, jstat, mdadm, hdparm, and custom logging
Successful 1TB data migration from AWS cloud
Wrote bash and python provisioning scripts
Configured Nagios SMS reporting across entire network
Researched database solutions for best blend of performance, reliability, warehousing, scalability, and ease of development
Configured Solr, Hazelcast, Memcached, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis clusters for replication
Set up & Managed NFS shares
Handled recoveries from raid1 and raid10 failures
Versioned local dev-box Vagrant environments via provisioning
Wrote countless data conversion scripts between MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and Solr in PHP, Python, and Bash
Configured logrotate to minimize potential disk space issues from verbose logging
Designed & developed scalable multi-threaded scraping system
Led new feature planning and scoring sessions and whiteboarding
Participated in Agile Scrum development cycles
Strict Object Oriented PHP 5.4+

work.summary: Designed and developed a custom CMS
highlights: Managed LAMP environment
Wordpress Installation
Created Custom AJAX CMS
Solicited famous poets for contributions
